titleStmt.title: The rebels looking-glasse: or, The traytors doome. Wherein is discovered the judgements of God upon the rebels and traytors in all ages: collected out of several histories both sacred & profane. With a narration of this present rebellion, and of the horrid and execrable acts committed therin, and the judgements of God already observed to be saln upon the first actors and tormentors thereof. Published for the reducing of those that are already rebells, and deterring others from that sinne, / By a faithfull and loyall subject to the present king, and a lover of his country.
